Privacy &hairsp; & Performance &hairsp; at accessiBe Our security - your peace of mind We implement the industry's highest practices and standards to protect your users' privacy and your website's security Need further info? Download our security and privacy statements Download State-of-the-art infrastructure &hairsp; based in the US Security Practices We use only highly secure servers based in the USA, with encryption standards that exceed industry norms and a high-redundancy infrastructure A pioneer in SOC2 &hairsp; compliance for digital accessibility. PRIVACY ASSURED, SECURITY CONFIRMED accessiBe ensures security and privacy in accordance with SOC2-compliant measures. Our validated controls confirm our unwavering commitment to the highest security and compliance standards Optimized for high performance &hairsp; and quick loading times 0.2 Seconds loading speed In our impatient digital age, performance is crucial - so we make sure never to slow you down. accessWidget is optimized to load asynchronously at 0.2 seconds, so it doesn't get in your or your users’ way Security &hairsp; practices and features The complete security suite See our list of extended security measures Data encryption during transmission and storage checkmark Support for data loss prevention checkmark Fail-safe ready servers in Europe checkmark Weekly vulnerability checks and audits checkmark Support for script and link tags integrity checkmark Dedicated DevOps team on payroll checkmark Daily manual and automatic malware scans checkmark App modularity with microservices checkmark Adequate access control measures checkmark Not sure if you're accessible?
